ht32f5xxxx_flash.c File Reference

This file provides all the FLASH firmware functions. More...

#include "ht32f5xxxx_flash.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Defines

#define FLASH_TIMEOUT   (0x000FFFFF)
#define FLASH_CMD_STADNBY   (0x00000000)
#define FLASH_CMD_PROGRAM   (0x00000004)
#define FLASH_CMD_PAGEERASE   (0x00000008)
#define FLASH_CMD_MASSERASE   (0x0000000A)
#define FLASH_READY   (0x6UL << 1)
#define FLASH_SEND_MAIN   (0x00000014)
#define CFCR_WAIT_MASK   (0xFFFFFFF8)
#define FLASH_PREFETCHBUF_ON   (0x00000010)
#define FLASH_PREFETCHBUF_OFF   (0xFFFFFFEF)
#define FLASH_BRANCHCACHE_ON   (0x00001000)
#define FLASH_BRANCHCACHE_OFF   (0xFFFFEFFF)
#define FLASH_CFCR_MASK   (0xFFFFEFE8)
#define FLASH_PREFETCHBUF_AND_BRANCHCACHE_ON   (0x00001010)
#define FLASH_PREFETCHBUF_AND_BRANCHCACHE_OFF   (0xFFFFEFEF)
#define IS_WAIT_STATE2(x)   (x == FLASH_WAITSTATE_2)
 Check parameter of the FLASH wait state.
#define IS_FLASH_WAITSTATE(WAIT)
#define IS_FLASH_VECTOR_MODE(MODE)
 Check parameter of the FLASH vector mapping.
#define IS_FLASH_ADDRESS(ADDRESS)   (ADDRESS < 0x20000000)
 Check parameter of the FLASH address.
#define IS_FLASH_WC_FLAG(FLAG)   ((FLAG & 0x0000001F) != 0)
 Check parameter of the FLASH interrupt status.
#define IS_FLASH_FLAG(FLAG)   ((FLAG & 0x0003001F) != 0)
 Check parameter of the FLASH interrupt flag.
#define IS_FLASH_INT(IT)   ((IT & 0x0000001F) != 0)
 Check parameter of the FLASH interrupt.

 Configure the FLASH wait state.

 Enable or Disable FLASH branch cache.

 Set vector remapping mode.

 Erase FLASH Option Byte page.

 Erase the entire FLASH.

 Program one word data.

 Program FLASH Option Byte page.

 Return security status of the FLASH.

 Enable or Disable the specific FLASH interrupts.

 Return flag status of the FLASH interrupt.
void FLASH_ClearIntFlag (u32 FLASH_FLAG_x)
 Clear specific interrupt flags of FLASH.
FLASH_State FLASH_WaitForOperationEnd (void)
 Wait untill the FLASH operation has finished or time-out has occurred.

Detailed Description

This file provides all the FLASH firmware functions.
